about.title: About me
about.intro: I am a Mobile Developer with Kotlin and Flutter from El Salvador, working in mobile application development and digital solutions. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive applications.
about.description: My job is to build your mobile application so that it is functional and user-friendly but at the same time attractive. Additionally, I add a personal touch to your product and make sure it is eye-catching and easy to use. My goal is to convey your message and identity in the most creative way possible. I have created mobile applications for many renowned companies.

mobileApps.title: Mobile apps
mobileApps.description: Professional development of Android applications with Flutter and Kotlin, learning Swift.

items.description: During my time at university, I learned about various topics including security, networks, Android development, web development, APIs, object-oriented programming, and dynamic programming.

items.position: Mobile Developer - Secretaria de Innovación de la Presidencia
details: Developed native applications with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose for Android.

Software developer with experience in mobile and web application development. Expert in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Flutter, and Node.js. Focused on implementing clean architectures and agile methodologies to optimize software development.
Integrated libraries such as Retrofit, Glide, and Room to enhance application functionality and performance.
Maintained native applications with Java and Kotlin.
Optimized existing applications and improved user experience.
Implemented libraries such as Dagger Hilt for dependency injection.
I developed applications with WordPress, following a design and ensuring the best user experience.
